subject: Problems while trying to make Cactus work with JUnit 4.0
msgSnippet: I ve got problems while trying to make Cactus (http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/) work with JUnit 4.0. To make it work I have to inherit my tests from
messageBody:
I've got problems while trying to make Cactus
(http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/) work with JUnit 4.0.

To make it work I have to inherit my tests from ServletTestCase. And
after doing that my test methods do not work! They simpky are not
recognized by tests runner. In debugger I saw rhis:
org.junit.internal.runners.OldTestClassRunner. So I think this is the
root of the problem - old test runner is called. Because he runner is
not old while running usual tests and there are no provblems with it.

The question is what is the solution.
